data.name: Hell Of An Office
data.detailed_description:
Hell of an Office is a vertical, first person platformer game where the players find themselves in a hellish space. They are frustrated office workers who must ascend through platforms of their office tower in ruins.

This game offers to the public a frenetic gameplay and the challenge of overcoming every level full of new obstacles.



FEATURES:
  • Responsive first person fast-paced movement.

  • Rocket jumping, dash and hook mechanics to overcome this vertical platformer.

  • Over 100 challenging levels that will put your skills to test.

  • Bizarre combination of modern-day office and hellish landscapes.

  • Outrun the never stopping rising lava.

  • 3 gorgeous worlds which introduce new mechanics: portals, wind tunnels, dissolving platforms and more!

  • Compete with your friends on the online leaderboards.

  • A campaign mode which gradually gets more and more evil.

  • A cool as hell soundtrack that'll make you rampage through the levels.

data.short_description: Rocket Jump your way through insane levels while you outrun the rising lava with the help of your precious stapler to escape from this hellish office.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: Microsoft Xbox ® Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD® FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 970 / ATI Radeon R9 series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: Microsoft Xbox ® Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) recommended
